title: Andragogical Mathematics Learning Design in Hybrid Learning Spaces

context.prior_knowledge: University-Level Foundational Mathematics Knowledge (Linear Algebra, Calculus, Statistics, etc.)
context.additional_context: Hybrid environment design to enhance adult learners' self-directedness, integrating digital technologies and physical spaces

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design mathematical problem-solving processes using LMS and digital tools
Learners enhance mathematical modeling competencies through collaborative projects in hybrid environments

Learners can create a weekly learning plan (digital calendar + physical planner) over two weeks, select three online lecture materials and two library resources, and submit an integrated learning report (approximately 1,000 characters).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
